sktemplate.name: Custom Message

raw.value:
{ "locale": "en", "subject": "Magic Link Confirmation", "variant": "MagicLink", "body": "

Magic Link

Magic link confirmation email

Please click the link below to validate your account:

Magic Link

If you didnt request this, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
The Ping team

Copyright Ping Identity 2024
", "deliveryMethod": "Email", "template": { "id": "general" } }

{ "locale": "en", "subject": "Username Recovery Requested", "variant": "Forgot Username", "body": "

Hello ${firstName} ${lastName}

Your username was requested.

Username: ${username}

If you didnt request this, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
The Ping team

Copyright Ping Identity 2024
", "deliveryMethod": "Email", "template": { "id": "general" } }

{ "locale": "en", "subject": "Forgot Password OTP", "variant": "Forgot Password", "body": "

Hello ${user.username}

A password reset has been requested

Use this OTP to reset your password ${otp}

If you didnt request this, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
The Ping team

Copyright Ping Identity 2024
", "deliveryMethod": "Email", "template": { "id": "strong_authentication" } }

nodeTitle.value: Get Schema ID from Target Env

raw.value:
{
    "name": "securityQA",
    "displayName": "Security Questions - Answers",
    "description": "json key value pairs for security QA (forgot password)",
    "schemaType": "CUSTOM",
    "type": "JSON",
    "unique": false,
    "enabled": true,
    "multiValued": false,
    "required": false
}

{
    "name": "dob",
    "displayName": "Date Of Birth",
    "schemaType": "CUSTOM",
    "type": "STRING",
    "unique": false,
    "enabled": true,
    "multiValued": false,
    "required": false,
    "regexValidation": {
        "pattern": "^[0-9]{4}-(0[1-9]|1[0-2])-(0[1-9]|1[0-9]|2[0-9]|3[0-1])$",
        "requirements": "Valid DOB"
    }
}
